method.name: xyz
method.digest: grain positions for an individual grain in the format of (index x y z)
method.description: grain positions for an individual grain in the format of (index x y z)

method.name: vizInfo
method.digest: Dictionary of grain visualization information generated by grainflow
method.description: Dictionary of grain visualization information generated by grainflow.spat.pan~

method.name: pos
method.digest: grain positions for an individual grain in the format of (index x y z)
method.description: grain positions for an individual grain in the format of (index x y z)

method.name: grainAmp
method.digest: set grain amplitudes in the format of grain value
method.description: set grain amplitudes in the format of grain value

method.name: setSpeakerAmps
method.digest: set speaker amplitudes for display in the format speaker value
method.description: set speaker amplitudes for display in the format speaker value

attribute.name: falloffDistance
attribute.description: Used in grainflow.span.pan~ to control the the distance a sound will be put into a speaker for distance based panning

attribute.name: speakerPositions
attribute.digest: Speaker positions in a list of XYZ coordinates
attribute.description: Speaker positions in a list of XYZ coordinates

attribute.name: dimmask
attribute.digest: A mask for what dimentions are used in spatialization
attribute.description: A mask for what dimentions are used in spatialization

attribute.name: falloffCurve
attribute.description: Used in grainflow.span.pan~ to control the falloff curve for the distance panning

attribute.name: zoneColor
attribute.digest: the color of the speaker zone
attribute.description: the color of the speaker zone
